Noodles.

Aug 2, 2021 — Yup, you read that right. Noodles. In virtually every culture, an iconic noodle dish exists – Italian pasta, Japanese udon, Korean japchae, Jewish kugel, Singaporean laksa, Filipino pancit, Dominican espaguetis – you get the point.
